segment.source: Managing the UE-V 1.0 Agent and Packages with PowerShell and WMI
segment.target: Managing the UE-V 1.0 Agent and Packages with PowerShell and WMI

segment.source: Managing the UE-V 1.0 Agent and Packages with PowerShell and WMI
segment.target: Managing the UE-V 1.0 Agent and Packages with PowerShell and WMI

segment.source: Managing the UE-V 1.0 Agent and Packages with PowerShell and WMI
segment.target: Managing the UE-V 1.0 Agent and Packages with PowerShell and WMI

segment.source: You can use WMI and PowerShell to manage Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) Agent configuration and synchronization behavior.
segment.target: You can use WMI and PowerShell to manage Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) Agent configuration and synchronization behavior.

segment.source: How to deploy the UE-V agent with PowerShell
segment.target: How to deploy the UE-V agent with PowerShell

segment.source: Stage the UE-V installer file in an accessible network share.
segment.target: Stage the UE-V installer file in an accessible network share.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: Use AgentSetup.exe to deploy both 32-bit and 64-bit versions of the UE-V Agent.
segment.target: Use AgentSetup.exe to deploy both 32-bit and 64-bit versions of the UE-V Agent.

segment.source: Windows Installer Files versions, AgentSetupx86.msi and AgentSetupx64.msi, are available for each architecture.
segment.target: Windows Installer Files versions, AgentSetupx86.msi and AgentSetupx64.msi, are available for each architecture.

segment.source: To uninstall the UE-V Agent at a later time using the installation file, you must use the same file type.
segment.target: To uninstall the UE-V Agent at a later time using the installation file, you must use the same file type.

segment.source: Use one of the following PowerShell commands to install the agent.
segment.target: Use one of the following PowerShell commands to install the agent.

segment.source: How to configure the UE-V Agent with PowerShell
segment.target: How to configure the UE-V Agent with PowerShell

segment.source: Use an account with administrator rights to open a PowerShell window.
segment.target: Use an account with administrator rights to open a PowerShell window.

segment.source: Import the UE-V PowerShell module by using the following command.
segment.target: Import the UE-V PowerShell module by using the following command.

segment.source: Use the following PowerShell commands to configure the agent.
segment.target: Use the following PowerShell commands to configure the agent.

segment.source: PowerShell command
segment.target: PowerShell command

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Get-UevConfiguration
segment.target: Get-UevConfiguration

segment.source: View the effective UE-V agent settings.
segment.target: View the effective UE-V agent settings.

segment.source: User-specific settings have precedence over the computer settings.
segment.target: User-specific settings have precedence over the computer settings.

segment.source: Get-UevConfiguration - CurrentComputerUser
segment.target: Get-UevConfiguration - CurrentComputerUser

segment.source: View the UE-V agent settings values for the current user only.
segment.target: View the UE-V agent settings values for the current user only.

segment.source: Get-UevConfiguration -Computer
segment.target: Get-UevConfiguration -Computer

segment.source: View the UE-V agent configuration settings values for all users on the computer.
segment.target: View the UE-V agent configuration settings values for all users on the computer.

segment.source: Set-UevConfiguration -Computer -SettingsStoragePath path to _settings_storage_location
segment.target: Set-UevConfiguration -Computer -SettingsStoragePath path to _settings_storage_location

segment.source: Define a per-computer settings storage location.
segment.target: Define a per-computer settings storage location.

segment.source: Set-UevConfiguration -CurrentComputerUser -SettingsStoragePath path to _settings_storage_location
segment.target: Set-UevConfiguration -CurrentComputerUser -SettingsStoragePath path to _settings_storage_location

segment.source: Define a per-user settings storage location.
segment.target: Define a per-user settings storage location.

segment.source: Set-UevConfiguration -Computer -SyncTimeoutInMilliseconds timeout in milliseconds
segment.target: Set-UevConfiguration -Computer -SyncTimeoutInMilliseconds timeout in milliseconds

segment.source: Set the synchronization timeout in milliseconds
segment.target: Set the synchronization timeout in milliseconds

segment.source: Set-UevConfiguration -CurrentComputerUser -SyncTimeoutInMilliseconds timeout in milliseconds
segment.target: Set-UevConfiguration -CurrentComputerUser -SyncTimeoutInMilliseconds timeout in milliseconds

segment.source: Set the synchronization timeout for the current user.
segment.target: Set the synchronization timeout for the current user.

segment.source: Set-UevConfiguration -Computer -MaxPackageSizeInBytes size in bytes
segment.target: Set-UevConfiguration -Computer -MaxPackageSizeInBytes size in bytes

segment.source: Configure the UE-V agent to report when a settings package file size reaches a defined threshold.
segment.target: Configure the UE-V agent to report when a settings package file size reaches a defined threshold.

segment.source: Set the threshold package size in bytes.
segment.target: Set the threshold package size in bytes.

segment.source: Set-UevConfiguration -CurrentComputerUser -MaxPackageSizeInBytes size in bytes
segment.target: Set-UevConfiguration -CurrentComputerUser -MaxPackageSizeInBytes size in bytes

segment.source: Set the package size warning threshold for the current user.
segment.target: Set the package size warning threshold for the current user.

segment.source: Set-UevConfiguration –Computer –SettingsTemplateCatalogPath path to catalog
segment.target: Set-UevConfiguration –Computer –SettingsTemplateCatalogPath path to catalog

segment.source: Set the settings template catalog path.
segment.target: Set the settings template catalog path.

segment.source: Set-UevConfiguration -Computer -SyncMethod sync method
segment.target: Set-UevConfiguration -Computer -SyncMethod sync method

segment.source: Set the synchronization method: OfflineFiles or None.
segment.target: Set the synchronization method: OfflineFiles or None.

segment.source: Set-UevConfiguration -CurrentComputerUser -SyncMethod sync method
segment.target: Set-UevConfiguration -CurrentComputerUser -SyncMethod sync method

segment.source: Set the synchronization method for the current user: OfflineFiles or None.
segment.target: Set the synchronization method for the current user: OfflineFiles or None.

segment.source: Set-UEVConfiguration -Computer –EnableSettingsImportNotify
segment.target: Set-UEVConfiguration -Computer –EnableSettingsImportNotify

segment.source: Enable notification to occur when the import of user settings is delayed.
segment.target: Enable notification to occur when the import of user settings is delayed.

segment.source: Use –DisableSettingsImportNotify to disable notification.
segment.target: Use –DisableSettingsImportNotify to disable notification.

segment.source: Set-UEVConfiguration - CurrentComputerUser -EnableSettingsImportNotify
segment.target: Set-UEVConfiguration - CurrentComputerUser -EnableSettingsImportNotify

segment.source: Enable notification for the current user when the import of user settings is delayed.
segment.target: Enable notification for the current user when the import of user settings is delayed.

segment.source: Use –DisableSettingsImportNotify to disable notification.
segment.target: Use –DisableSettingsImportNotify to disable notification.

segment.source: Set-UEVConfiguration -Computer -SettingsImportNotifyDelayInSeconds
segment.target: Set-UEVConfiguration -Computer -SettingsImportNotifyDelayInSeconds

segment.source: Specify the time in seconds before the user is notified
segment.target: Specify the time in seconds before the user is notified

segment.source: Set-UEVConfiguration - CurrentComputerUser -SettingsImportNotifyDelayInSeconds
segment.target: Set-UEVConfiguration - CurrentComputerUser -SettingsImportNotifyDelayInSeconds

segment.source: Specify the time in seconds before notification for the current user.
segment.target: Specify the time in seconds before notification for the current user.

segment.source: Set-UevConfiguration –Computer –DisableSync
segment.target: Set-UevConfiguration –Computer –DisableSync

segment.source: Disable UE-V for all the users on the computer.
segment.target: Disable UE-V for all the users on the computer.

segment.source: Use –EnableSync to enable or re-enable.
segment.target: Use –EnableSync to enable or re-enable.

segment.source: Set-UevConfiguration –CurrentComputerUser -DisableSync
segment.target: Set-UevConfiguration –CurrentComputerUser -DisableSync

segment.source: Disable UE-V for the current user on the computer.
segment.target: Disable UE-V for the current user on the computer.

segment.source: Use –EnableSync to enable or re-enable.
segment.target: Use –EnableSync to enable or re-enable.

segment.source: Clear-UevConfiguration –Computer -setting name
segment.target: Clear-UevConfiguration –Computer -setting name

segment.source: Clear a specific setting for all users on the computer.
segment.target: Clear a specific setting for all users on the computer.

segment.source: Clear-UevConfiguration –CurrentComputerUser -setting name
segment.target: Clear-UevConfiguration –CurrentComputerUser -setting name

segment.source: Clear a specific setting for the current user only.
segment.target: Clear a specific setting for the current user only.

segment.source: Export-UevConfiguration settings migration file
segment.target: Export-UevConfiguration settings migration file

segment.source: Export the UE-V computer configuration to a settings migration file.
segment.target: Export the UE-V computer configuration to a settings migration file.

segment.source: The extension of the file must be “.uev”.
segment.target: The extension of the file must be “.uev”.

segment.source: The export cmdlet exports all UE-V agent settings that are configurable with the -computer parameter.
segment.target: The export cmdlet exports all UE-V agent settings that are configurable with the -computer parameter.

segment.source: Import-UevConfiguration settings migration file
segment.target: Import-UevConfiguration settings migration file

segment.source: Import the UE-V computer configuration from a settings migration file (.uev file).
segment.target: Import the UE-V computer configuration from a settings migration file (.uev file).

segment.source: How to export UE-V package settings and repair UE-V templates with PowerShell
segment.target: How to export UE-V package settings and repair UE-V templates with PowerShell

segment.source: Open a PowerShell window as an Administrator.
segment.target: Open a PowerShell window as an Administrator.

segment.source: Import the UE-V PowerShell module with the following command.
segment.target: Import the UE-V PowerShell module with the following command.

segment.source: Use the following PowerShell commands to configure the agent.
segment.target: Use the following PowerShell commands to configure the agent.

segment.source: PowerShell command
segment.target: PowerShell command

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Export-UevPackage MicrosoftCalculator6.pkgx
segment.target: Export-UevPackage MicrosoftCalculator6.pkgx

segment.source: Extracts the settings from a Microsoft Calculator package file and converts them into a human-readable format in XML.
segment.target: Extracts the settings from a Microsoft Calculator package file and converts them into a human-readable format in XML.

segment.source: Repair-UevTemplateIndex
segment.target: Repair-UevTemplateIndex

segment.source: Repairs the index of the UE-V settings location templates.
segment.target: Repairs the index of the UE-V settings location templates.

segment.source: How to configure the UE-V Agent with WMI
segment.target: How to configure the UE-V Agent with WMI

segment.source: User Experience Virtualization provides the following set of WMI commands.
segment.target: User Experience Virtualization provides the following set of WMI commands.

segment.source: Administrators can use this interface to configure the UE-V agent from the command line and automate typical configuration tasks.
segment.target: Administrators can use this interface to configure the UE-V agent from the command line and automate typical configuration tasks.

segment.source: Use an account with administrator rights to open a PowerShell window.
segment.target: Use an account with administrator rights to open a PowerShell window.

segment.source: Use the following WMI commands to configure the agent.
segment.target: Use the following WMI commands to configure the agent.

segment.source: PowerShell command
segment.target: PowerShell command

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Get-WmiObject -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV Configuration
segment.target: Get-WmiObject -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV Configuration

segment.source: View the active UE-V agent settings.
segment.target: View the active UE-V agent settings.

segment.source: User-specific settings have precedence over the computer settings.
segment.target: User-specific settings have precedence over the computer settings.

segment.source: Get-WmiObject -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV UserConfiguration
segment.target: Get-WmiObject -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV UserConfiguration

segment.source: View the UE-V agent configuration that is defined for user.
segment.target: View the UE-V agent configuration that is defined for user.

segment.source: Get-WmiObject -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV ComputerConfiguration
segment.target: Get-WmiObject -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV ComputerConfiguration

segment.source: View the UE-V agent configuration that is defined for computer.
segment.target: View the UE-V agent configuration that is defined for computer.

segment.source: $config = Get-WmiObject -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV ComputerConfiguration
segment.target: $config = Get-WmiObject -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV ComputerConfiguration

segment.source: $config.SettingsStoragePath = path_to_settings_storage_location
segment.target: $config.SettingsStoragePath = path_to_settings_storage_location

segment.source: $config.Put()
segment.target: $config.Put()

segment.source: Define a per-computer settings storage location.
segment.target: Define a per-computer settings storage location.

segment.source: $config = Get-WmiObject -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV UserConfiguration
segment.target: $config = Get-WmiObject -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV UserConfiguration

segment.source: $config.SettingsStoragePath = path_to_settings_storage_location
segment.target: $config.SettingsStoragePath = path_to_settings_storage_location

segment.source: $config.Put()
segment.target: $config.Put()

segment.source: Define a per-user settings storage location.
segment.target: Define a per-user settings storage location.

segment.source: $config = Get-WmiObject -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV ComputerConfiguration
segment.target: $config = Get-WmiObject -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV ComputerConfiguration

segment.source: $config.SyncTimeoutInMilliseconds = timeout_in_milliseconds
segment.target: $config.SyncTimeoutInMilliseconds = timeout_in_milliseconds

segment.source: $config.Put()
segment.target: $config.Put()

segment.source: Set the synchronization timeout in milliseconds.
segment.target: Set the synchronization timeout in milliseconds.

segment.source: $config = Get-WmiObject -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV ComputerConfiguration
segment.target: $config = Get-WmiObject -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV ComputerConfiguration

segment.source: $config.MaxPackageSizeInBytes = size_in_bytes
segment.target: $config.MaxPackageSizeInBytes = size_in_bytes

segment.source: $config.Put()
segment.target: $config.Put()

segment.source: Configure the UE-V agent to report when a settings package file size reaches a defined threshold.
segment.target: Configure the UE-V agent to report when a settings package file size reaches a defined threshold.

segment.source: Set the threshold package file size in bytes.
segment.target: Set the threshold package file size in bytes.

segment.source: $config = Get-WmiObject -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV ComputerConfiguration
segment.target: $config = Get-WmiObject -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV ComputerConfiguration

segment.source: $config.SyncMethod = sync_method
segment.target: $config.SyncMethod = sync_method

segment.source: $config.Put()
segment.target: $config.Put()

segment.source: Set the synchronization method: OfflineFiles or None.
segment.target: Set the synchronization method: OfflineFiles or None.

segment.source: $config = Get-WmiObject -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV ComputerConfiguration
segment.target: $config = Get-WmiObject -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV ComputerConfiguration

segment.source: $config.setting namesetting value
segment.target: $config.setting namesetting value

segment.source: $config.Put()
segment.target: $config.Put()

segment.source: Update a specific per-computer setting.
segment.target: Update a specific per-computer setting.

segment.source: To clear the setting, use $null as the setting value.
segment.target: To clear the setting, use $null as the setting value.

segment.source: $config = Get-WmiObject -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV ComputerConfiguration
segment.target: $config = Get-WmiObject -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV ComputerConfiguration

segment.source: $config.setting namesetting value
segment.target: $config.setting namesetting value

segment.source: $config.Put()
segment.target: $config.Put()

segment.source: Update a specific per-user setting.
segment.target: Update a specific per-user setting.

segment.source: To clear the setting, use $null as the setting value.
segment.target: To clear the setting, use $null as the setting value.
